description.brief: Device driver to parse a NMEA0183 stream

package.description: This library does NOT implement the protocol parsing itself. We're using 'marnav' for this. It is instead only proposing a iodrivers_base-based class to read NMEA streams in general, and/or an AIS stream in particular (since AIS streams are a bit strange)
package.author: Sylvain Joyeux/sylvain.joyeux@tidewise.io
